description: The Reference ID for the Financial Aid External Award Data Load.

StudentObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

StudentObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

StudentObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Financial_Aid_External_Award_Data.description: The Student Application Financial Aid Period Record of the Student in which to deliver the External Award. If not set for Student Applicants, all qualifying Student Applications will receive award. If not set for Students with Financial Aid Records, all qualifying Financial Aid Records will receive award.

description: Element Container for Financial Aid External Award Data

validation.validation: The student award item must be effective for the current date.
The specified student has been merged with another student record. Specify the merged student instead.
Enter a Student Application that matches the Student.
The academic period and institutional academic unit must be valid for the student's attendance plan.
You can only specify an External Award Academic Period Amount or set the External Merit Award flag. You can’t specify any other values on an existing external award.
